articles.content: “It took me 17 years to get a diagnosis for endometriosis. My symptoms began when I was around 10 years old, and I kept going from one doctor to another throughout my late childhood and teenage years… [+5866 chars]

articles.author: Team Newsable
articles.title: Aspirin increases the risk of heart failure by 26 pc, says new study - Asianet News English
articles.description: This was the first large-scale study to examine the relationship between aspirin use and heart failure in individuals with and without heart disease
articles.content: This was the first large-scale study to examine the relationship between aspirin use and heart failure in individuals with and without heart diseaseTaking aspirin increases the risk of heart failure … [+3066 chars]
